New Records: Maheesh Theekshana took 3 wickets for 25 runs
Charith Asalanka was named Player of the Series
Key Match Events: Brandon King scored 16 runs before being dismissed
Post-Match Reflections: Maheesh Theekshana was named Player of the Match
Charith Asalanka was the highest scorer for Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Kandy
